attributes.action: Regular British Army, Raise Age Cut Off Restriction
attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE PLEASE take 5 minutes of your valuble time to sign this e-petition & also please post it on your Facebook wall & kindly ask your friends to also do the same.

Also PLEASE share this e-petition in any other way possible.

The cut off age of 35 for the Regular Army is too young. Even if it were raised by 2 years I and many others could be given a fair chance to apply & not just be limited to the TA's.

Remember, Wether you agree with war or not these Brave Men & Women are defending us, our countries & the brave warriors that serve along side them so please take 5 minutes to sign & show your support.

Thanks in advance to anyone who takes the time to sign this e-petition.
